full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DUL BA'I GLENG BUM CHEN MO LAS BYUNG BA'I MING BRDA GO DKA' BA RNAMS BSHAD PA BLO LDAN DGA' SKYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,SMRAS PA, MING DANG BRDA RNAMS YUL DUS KYIS, ,'GYUR ZHING BRJOD 'DOD RJES 'BRANG PHYIR, ,GCIG TU NGES PA MA YIN MOD, ,'DIR NI SKABS DON DANG BSTUN TE, ,BRDA RNYING LA SOGS GO DKA' BA, ,RAGS RIS NYUNG NGU'I TSUL GYIS BKRAL, ,NOR 'KHRUL GANG MCHIS MKHAS LA 'CHAGS, ,LEGS CHA BLO LDAN DGYES PHYIR 'BUL, ,'DI NI RAB 'BYAMS GZHUNG SMRA BA'I, ,BSHES GNYEN SHES RAB MTSAN CAN GYIS, ,BSKUL PHYIR DBYANGS CAN DGA' BLOS BRIS, ,SKAL MNYAM DAG LA PHAN GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,DZA YANTU,, ,,
